com.viaoa.jfc.control

Class FormattedTextFieldController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.hub.HubListenerAdapter
      • com.viaoa.jfc.control.OAJfcController
        • com.viaoa.jfc.control.FormattedTextFieldController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.viaoa.hub.HubListener, FocusListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, EventListener

    public class FormattedTextFieldController
extends OAJfcController
implements FocusListener, KeyListener, MouseListener
    Functionality for binding OAFormattedTextField to OA.
    Author:
    vvia
